title: Wendy's Ghost Pepper Ranch | Copycat recipe

tasks.task: Make a copycat version of Wendy's Ghost Pepper Ranch Dipping Sauce.
subtasks: Gather ingredients (mayonnaise, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, dried parsley, paprika, Ghost Pepper powder, buttermilk).
Mix mayonnaise with garlic powder, onion powder, salt, dried parsley, paprika, and Ghost Pepper powder.
Whisk the mixture until well combined.
Taste the sauce and adjust seasoning if necessary (add more salt in this case).
Refrigerate the sauce to set flavors.
Serve the sauce with chicken nuggets for testing and comparison.
Share recipe and recommend using Duke's mayonnaise for a vinegar flavor.
Compare taste and heat level to original Wendy's sauce.
Adjust seasoning if necessary (found to be good already in this case).
Check for balance of flavors (ranch, heat, vinegar from mayonnaise).
Film or record video of the sauce-making process.
Take pictures or videos of the finished sauce.
Conduct taste test by dipping chicken nuggets into the sauce.
Note observations about flavor and heat level comparison.

subtasks: Explain the modifications made to the original recipe.

Share thoughts on how the homemade version compares to the original.
